resources.string: AHS Library Management Mobile Application is design for Araullo High School Library use. The purpose of this application is to provide a basic monitoring and management system for the Araullo High School library. It will help librarians to track their collection, check out and return books, register students in a database and much more.

This Mobile Application is a Capstone Project prepared and submitted by Patrick Lofranco, Lovely Toston, Mika Francisco, Cheska Grafil, Jamia Baldoviso as partial fulfilment of the requirements for the degree of Bachelor of Science in Information Technology.

Library Open Hours
7:00AM - 4:00PM / 7:00AM - 6:00PM 

Always wear your mask inside of our library and Keep the safe distance between others.


L isten to the Librarian
 I nquire (Ask) if you need help
 B e respectful of others and the library space
 R ead and Speak Quietly
 A lways walk
 R eturn books in right place
 Y ou are always welcome to come in!


If you need assistance, you can ask for our librarian!
600-699 : Technology and Applied Science (medicine, engineering, agriculture, home economics, radio, TV, and aviation)
700-799 : Fine Arts and Recreation (architecture, sculpture, painting, music, photography and recreation)
000-099 : General References or Works (encyclopedias, biographies, periodicals and journalism)
300-399 : Social Sciences (how people live and work in society; law, government and institutions)
500-599 : Natural Science (Mathematics, astronomy, physics, chemistry, geology, paleontology, biology, zoology, and botany)
800-899 :Literature (plays, poems, essays, literature in foreign languages)
900-999 : History and Biography (history, biography, geography and other related disciplines)
